desc.en: Atsuko continues to pretend to be a student, since she's never had the chance to do so. Atsuko and Sensei explore the daily life of an ordinary schoolgirl. But they have to quickly escape when a guard appears.
desc.jp: Atsuko continues to pretend to be a student, since she's never had the chance to do so. Atsuko and Sensei explore the daily life of an ordinary schoolgirl. But they have to quickly escape when a guard appears.
desc.zh_cn: 在深夜的校园里，继续玩之前没能玩过的学校游戏的{cf敦子}。{cf敦子}和老师正在一起探访平凡的学校日常生活时，为了躲避突然出现的警卫而逃跑了。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sensei and Chihiro return after a late night of running server maintenance at the data center. On the way back, Chihiro tells Sensei about a place that she's fond of and takes them to a vending machine for drinks.
desc.jp: Sensei and Chihiro return after a late night of running server maintenance at the data center. On the way back, Chihiro tells Sensei about a place that she's fond of and takes them to a vending machine for drinks.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cf千寻}在他们负责的数据中心进行服务器维护，两人一直工作到深夜才总算得以返家。在回家的路上，{cf千寻}把老师带到了一个饮料自动贩卖机前，并告诉他自己很喜欢来这里。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Miku, the virtual idol, obtains a corporeal body with the help of Kivotos technology but suddenly loses her singing abilities. Miku covertly asks for the help of Kivotos' reputable problem-solver, Sensei.
desc.jp: Miku, the virtual idol, obtains a corporeal body with the help of Kivotos technology but suddenly loses her singing abilities. Miku covertly asks for the help of Kivotos' reputable problem-solver, Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 虚拟歌手初音{cf未来}借助奇普托斯的先进技术，获得了一具现实躯体，然而因为一些不明的原因，{cl初音}突然失去了唱歌能力。为了解决这个问题，{cl初音}只好偷偷向人称「奇普托斯万事通」的老师求助。

desc.en: Blue New World is a single officially released as the unique song for the collab character Hatsune Miku. It is used during the collab event and Miku's bond story (her L2D as well).
desc.jp: Blue New World is a single officially released as the unique song for the collab character Hatsune Miku. It is used during the collab event and Miku's bond story (her L2D as well).
desc.zh_cn: 《蔚蓝新世界》（Blue New World）是在初音未来联动活动期间发行的一首单曲，用于活动内故事和初音未来的L2D。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Blue New World is a single officially released as the unique song for the collab character Hatsune Miku. It is used during the collab event and Miku's bond story (her L2D as well).
desc.jp: Blue New World is a single officially released as the unique song for the collab character Hatsune Miku. It is used during the collab event and Miku's bond story (her L2D as well).

desc.en: Sensei happens upon Kayoko looking after a kitten on a rainy day.
desc.jp: Sensei happens upon Kayoko looking after a kitten on a rainy day.
desc.zh_cn: 在下着雨的日子，老师偶然得知{cf佳世子}在照顾小猫。
